@Lawers99 @cmsouter picked my third attempt for a view carefully!

Really must go to the Lakes more often. Cracking day riding Helvellyn https://t.co/gFxGeI1RoM
Bike survived return flights to Europe in cardboard box but security took my bike lock off me in case I hit someone on the head. Seriously?

Taking a break from the bike on Lake Bled, Slovenia https://t.co/VzhqJ1euND
Very cute food stop heading into Kranjska Gora, Slovenia #cycletouring #kosobrin https://t.co/8Lt5hgwg77
@edfoc @reizkultur we're staying a few km down the road in St Johann im Pongau!
Berchtesgaden Alps, Austria showing off when the cloud lifted #cycletouring https://t.co/1DJ4fMHTDe
Infrastructure for cycle touring in Bavaria awesome & almost outnumbered by electric bikes. Lake Chiemsee to Inzell https://t.co/1mvM11sWw7
Thanks for the speedy delivery @BcBiking. Beer mats a very nice touch! https://t.co/3cpHJVmAet
What a day to riding part of the West Highland Way. Hike a bike up Devil's Staircase https://t.co/mwcXcnmr9l
Great storytelling and delivery by @leecraigie_ and helpers @edfoc tonight. Feeling very inspired to go on the Highland Trail 550 journey
@vekestratt yeah it's a great route and pain of the climb definitely worth it!
Whether you like fat or skinny, the borders has it all for biking. The Peebles-Talla loop this time #tweedlove https://t.co/5SwKD1s4CV
Inspiring talk by @1loveMountains @edfoc last night. Want to pack light and head to Central Asia with my ukulele
@visitcolonsay sadly I'm not going to make it a 3rd consecutive weekend!
Packrafting trip to Colonsay. Perfect conditions for floating with the tide otter spotting https://t.co/uR2gJaOni7
When places are this good, you've got to go back for seconds. Another stunning weekend in Colonsay @visitcolonsay https://t.co/FkbfO4J5F6
@Wild_Scotland wish I could have stayed all week!
Discovering Colonsay by bike and paddleboard. Sea otters, seal colonies, vast bird life and beaches @visitcolonsay https://t.co/9731M6wbIh
Colonsay, my new favourite island. Rugged wilderness, amazing wildlife, stunning beaches & crystal clear water https://t.co/CGgGKVvwPl
Feeling spoiled that this is my rehab ride from Edinburgh https://t.co/NWuxv7VioO
“@adventuresynd: We did it!!!!!!! #northcoast500 A photo finish for 36 hours #nc500” Great effort! What’s next?!
Awesome weekend at #airmaiden Helen Gaskell demoing a drop off. Great vibe & can't wait for next year when fully fit https://t.co/Xop2KA6l1m
Great session with @JillCruickL2S introducing us to NLP. Feeling very inspired and positive #purplegiraffe
Brilliant week for after work exploring in the Pentlands https://t.co/2VK67rmOe6
Live on the edges or not at all. Love this @gapingvoid https://t.co/GyCPUmAgu9
@DSmithGB that is awesome. Won’t be long until you’re on the bike #inspiring
Exciting to hear @leecraigie_ talk about launch of @adventuresynd on @BBCRadioScot Good luck!
Impressive range of support mechanisms for independent prescribers in training & qualified @FionaReid7 @NES_Pharmacy
Sunshine coast on Saturday bimble to North Berwick. Great to be on bike again after 4 months! #eastlothian https://t.co/j2BwagG7rP
@Phe800 brilliant! Hopefully I’m going to reach my sweet spot in a couple of months
Another day discovering stunning deserted beaches on the Isle of Coll https://t.co/i9o870Ru4z
Stunning day on the Isle of Coll. April is the new May https://t.co/M1Hh26bLRt
Good to see the Rum Cuillins from a different viewpoint. Rather than being from the ridge itself, this is from Eigg https://t.co/oeGMJW7Afa
The friendliest barista around and coffee spot on @beardedbarista_ @FountainFridays
The physician of the future will give no medication.Wheelchair to walking by changing diet https://t.co/DrBfr5no41
Fascinating debate @EdSciFest exploring transhumanism v biology of aging. Quality of life infers quantity of life https://t.co/NKIwL7Tax9
@NoMeatAthlete thanks for that. Definitely been caught out with the cheese.
If you've got something hard to do, take time out & watch this. Inside the mind of a master procrastinator https://t.co/Sxbgen7uH3
Finally got round to getting photos together from cycle touring trip: Outer Hebrides and beyond https://t.co/fuCBgneFu3
Fab street art on the way to Strathclyde Uni this morning #morningsmiles https://t.co/WIkzmyhZzR
@RunnerLil_Red great photo!
Just put in readings for Jan/Feb. Staggering difference is from being injured and inside all the time #getoutdoors https://t.co/Ky6SPPfIcM
@DSmithGB if anyone’s going to nail rehab I’d definitely have my money on you. All the best
Stunning day for ski touring or mountaineering but need to be patient. Make the most of it everyone #scotwinter #fedupbeinginjured
It's been a long time coming but finally got to see the mountains this winter @cairngorms #lookbutdonttouch https://t.co/gUaE7HwGYV
Beach combing in North Berwick, perfect escape from the city https://t.co/VEiJMvyglm
@steamingboots inspiring as always. I struggle carrying tripod plus camping gear. How heavy do you reckon your pack is?!
@steamingboots great photos. Imagine pretty nippy overnight
Inspirational talk from @leecraigie_ @The_EMFF and stunning film of Cape Wrath bike/packrafting journey. Breathe in, breathe out
At this rate I'm not going to have to cook again until after the summer thanks to @DeliciouslyElla new book and freezer full of yumminess
@NorthCoast500 hell yeah! Hoping to cycle in spring
@bikeradar @LiveLoveFindra looking forward to the padded legging liners. Are they same pattern as in Inners pop up shop at Christmas?
Benefit of lying low is discovering wee gems on your doorstep like Moon and Hare cafe, Bruntsfield. Veggie, vegan, organic & raw. Delicious
Got @DeliciouslyElla new book yesterday and already made 4 recipes. Delicious #cleanliving
@LiveLoveFindra they’d get blown off with the wind we’ve got coming!
Love this @annamcnuff Just need to sort out some injuries first https://t.co/gTFbZ262QS
@_BenForsyth_ bumped into your dad nightriding in the Pentlands. Looking like his training is paying off!
Great being able to follow #strathpuffer live. Good luck everyone https://t.co/4DWmwvFtGy
@steamingboots great photo
@EdinburghBikes it's seriously not cool being injured and unable to commute by bike just now. £4 bus/day and have to get up 30 mins earlier
Think I might have to come off social media; winter wonderland arrives just as I've done my back in. The photos are incredible
12 Winter Riding Tips to Make the Season Fun | ENDURO Mountainbike Magazine https://t.co/VH9zOJM5MW
Good cover at Glenshee for ski touring today. Forecast much better than expected https://t.co/GDb5DQpaPA
Western Isles look stunning even in wind & rain. Happy memories & roll on next #rothangurobhanais @bbcalba @KerryMacPhee @kirstymacphee10
@Adrianne_Hill incredible and inspiring challenge. Look forward to seeing your route and following your blog. Good luck
Trying to warm up after the Limekilns New Years Dip https://t.co/PmSjd8wRUm
Hogmanay ride before the partying starts. Snow, wipe out and heaps of mud #mountainbiking https://t.co/79nGOMX36H
Roads Less Travelled @CameronMcNeish @Adventure_Show showcasing West Highlands & inspiring me for 2016 adventures bikepacking & packrafting
In the absence of any ski touring action, enjoying road bike debut in the sun #comeonsnow #notsureaboutlycra https://t.co/2hQcS0nEAu
Charitable thing in my street just now where people leave things they don't want. Tonights addition is a toilet aid https://t.co/ERn7NfDdVZ
